SqlRequestDto.value: SELECT brandName, packingForm, activeIngredient, count, lastUpdate, pharmacyName, address, contactNumber, pharmacyId, medicamentId FROM medicament, availability, pharmacy WHERE (medicament.id = availability.medicamentId AND pharmacy.id = availability.pharmacyId) AND (brandName LIKE :request OR activeIngredient LIKE :request OR count LIKE :request OR address LIKE :request) ORDER BY brandName
